content: rounds 3 3 3 4 4 5 more times next round k all next round k to marker x p to end separate body and sleeves place sleeve stitches between first 2 markers on scrap yarn cast on 4 6 8 10 12 14 stitches and at the same time move marker a to middle of these cast on stitches which is now the beginning of the round k across back to next marker place other sleeve stitches on scrap yarn cast on 4 6 8 10 12 14 stitches and place marker in the middle of those continue working this round across the front as follows k21 18 19 16 21 22 m1 k2 16 20 22 26 26 28 times k to end you should now have 92 100 110 118 130 140 stitches on both front and back pieces body knit body straight until it measures approx 10 cm from underarms next round k8 m1 k to 8 st before next marker m1 sm 2 times next 11 rounds k straight repeat last 12 rounds 6 more times you should now have 212 228 248 264 288 308 st page 2 buttercup by heidi kirrmaier version 6 updated for cast-on st august 23 2009 knit to 38 cm from underarms or 2 cm shy of desired length on last round m4 m6 m4 m6 - decr 2 evenly spread out gives you a multiple of 18 next round p all next 2 rounds k all next round k2 decrease 3 times yo k1 6 times k2 decrease 3 times 12 13 14 15 16 17 times next round p all next round k all next round p all next round bind off knitwise with medium gauge sleeves starting with new yarn and 2 circular needles the same size as used for body at the middle of the body underarm pick up and knit 2 3 4 5 6 7 st knit across sleeve stitches then pick up and knit 2 3 4 5 6 7 more stitches to middle of underarm should have 62 66 72 78 86 94 st continue working in the round using 2 circular needles for 3 rounds next round k 22 24 27 30 34 38 ssk k1 3 times k2 decrease k1 3 times k to end you can make more or less of these decreases if the sleeve edge is too small or too large switch to smaller needles next round p all next round k all next round p all next round bind off knitwise with medium to snug gauge finishing with smaller needle pick up and knit about 3 st for every 4 row along vertical left front neck edge continue picking up the number of cast on st for the left sleeve back and right sleeve sections and the same number for right vertical neck edge as for the left edge do not go along lace panel this already has a finished edge pick up fewer st
